Description: Bronze figure of Khons wearing a composite lunar/atef crown with the side-lock; incised pectoral; modern tang beneath the base.
Exhibition history: 2005-2006 Oct-Feb, Houston Museum of Natural Sciences, Mummy: The Inside Story 2006 7 Mar-6 Aug, Mobile (Alabama), Gulf Coast Exploreum Science Center, Mummy: The Inside Story 2006-2007 6 Oct-18 Feb, Tokyo, National Museum of Nature and Science, Mummy: The Inside Story 2007 17 Mar-17 Jun, Kobe City Museum, Mummy: The Inside Story 19th Nov 2011- 11 Mar 2012.
